HELP:
🏥 *HEALTH ALERT BOT - ODISHA* (Demo Mode)

📋 *AVAILABLE COMMANDS:*

• *HELP* - Show this menu
• *FIRSTAID* [condition] - First aid instructions
• *PREVENT* [disease] - Prevention guidelines
• *ALERT* [disease] [location] - Report outbreak
• *STATS* - View outbreak statistics

🚨 *EMERGENCY HELPLINES:*
• Ambulance: *108*
• Police: *100*
• Fire Service: *101*
FIRSTAID burns:
🔥 *FIRST AID: BURNS* (Demo)

✅ *IMMEDIATE STEPS:*

1️⃣ Cool with cold water (10-20 minutes)
2️⃣ Remove jewelry before swelling
3️⃣ Cover with sterile gauze
4️⃣ Take pain relievers if needed
5️⃣ Seek medical help for severe burns

❌ *DO NOT:*
• Apply ice, butter, or toothpaste
• Break blisters

🚨 *CALL 108 IF:*
• Burn is large or deep
• Person is in shock
PREVENT malaria:
🦟 *MALARIA PREVENTION* (Demo)

1. Use mosquito nets while sleeping
2. Apply mosquito repellent (DEET-based)
3. Wear long sleeves & pants after sunset
4. Remove stagnant water around home
5. Use window screens if possible

🏥 *Symptoms to watch:*
• High fever with chills
• Severe headache
• Body aches
